description:
Ritter decided that chocolate on the inside of Smarties wasn’t enough chocolate. Taking the classic candy crunch of Smarties and smothering them in creamy white chocolate, Ritter doubles down on chocolate in the best way. As part of Ritter’s seasonal collection, this bar is only here for a limited time, so enjoy it while you can.

  • Ingredients: sugar, cocoa butter, Smarties (sugar, skimmed milk powder, cocoa mass, cocoa butter, wheat flour, butterfat, whey powder, rice starch, emulsifier: soya lecithin, colour (beetroot red, carotenes, curcumin), spirulina concentrate, glazing agent (carnauba wax, white beeswax), barley malt extract, plant concentrates (safflower, radish)), lactose, butterfat, emulsifier: soya lecithin
  • Contains: gluten and soy
  • May contain peanuts, other tree nuts, and eggs
name: Ritter Sport Smarties in White Chocolate Bar
